Whats new?

NIRF 2024 Rankings are out. As per the latest NIRF 2024 rankings, IPU ranks #89 under the category 'Engineering'.

GGSIPU (IP University) admissions 2025 are open. The IPU CET 2025 applications are open for UG and PG courses, and the last date is Mar 31, 2025. Further, the IPU CET 2025 exams will be held from Apr 26 to May 18, 2025. A few more updates are as follows:

  • The GATE 2025 results for admission to the ME/Mtech/PhD courses are scheduled to be announced on Mar 19, 2025.
  • The CUET PG 2025 exam dates have been revised for admission to PG courses. As per the notification, the exam is scheduled to be held between Mar 13, 2025, and Apr 1, 2025.
  • NEET UG 2025 registration has opened for admission to the MBBS/BDS courses, and the last date to register is Mar 7, 2025. The NEET UG 2025 exam is to be conducted on May 4, 2025.
  • The NIMCET 2025 application form for admission to the MCA course will be released tentatively in Mar 2025. The NIMCET 2025 exam dates will be announced soon.
  • The CLAT 2025 counselling process has been delayed for admission to the 5-year Integrated LLB (UG) and one-year LLM (PG) courses. The revised schedule is yet to be released.
  • PhD Jul 2025 applications are open, and the last date to apply is Mar 31, 2025. Further, the entrance test will be held from Apr 26 to May 18, 2025.
  • The CUET UG registration 2025 is open for admission to UG courses, and the last date to register is Mar 22, 2025. Additionally, the CUET UG 2025 exam will be conducted tentatively between May 8 and Jun 1, 2025.

GGSIPU Highlights 2025

GGSIPU is ranked 1001-1200 by the QS World University Rankings 2025. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU), also known as Indraprastha University or IPU, is recognised as a state university. IPU Delhi is a teaching-cum-affiliating university. IP University is accredited with an A++ grade by the NAAC and recognised by the UGC. IPU is also ranked 80th by NIRF 2024 under the University category, 29th by NIRF 2024 under the Architecture and Planning category, and 89th by NIRF 2024 under the Engineering category.

In addition to this, the Medical courses offered at the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University GGSIPU Delhi are approved by the National Medical Commission (NMC). Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University offers various UG, PG, and Doctoral level courses across the streams of Engineering, Management, Medicine, Law, and Commerce, among others. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University course admission is based on the entrance exams. IP University is known for its Law, Management, Engineering, and Computer Application programmes. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University Dwarka Delhi is committed to providing professional education with innovation, creativity, and continuous change. Indraprastha University provides placement assistance to students. IP University Delhi is visited by top companies such as Adobe, Rapido, and others. Some of the important highlights regarding Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University are listed below:

Commonly asked questions
On Highlights

Q: Can I get direct admission in GGSIPU?

A: 

No, the university does not offer direct admissions. IP University does not allow any of the affiliated colleges/institutes/agency to grant direct admission to any of the course of the university. Hence, the university is not responsible for any amount deposited or paid by the candidate directly to the affiliated colleges/institutes of GGSIPU. Candidates are also advised to not share their User ID or Username and the login password with anyone for safety purposes.

Upvote

Q: What is the expected GGSIPU MBBS cutoff 2024?

A: 

The expected GGSIPU MBBS cutoff 2024 offered through Vardhman Mahavir Medical College is must range between 107 and 129. The UNiversity offers MBBS through North Delhi Municipal Corporation Medical College and Hindu Rao Hospital, the expected MBBS cutoff must range between 909 and is 1054 for the Geenarl category All India students. The ranks have been estimated on the basis of closing ranks of MBBS course offered throught NEET UG Round 1 Seat Allotment results. For more information regarding GGSIPU MBBS cutoff 2024, click here. 

Upvote

Q: Is it worth doing BTech from IPU?

A: 

During GGSIPU Engineering placements in 2022, the highest and average package offered was INR 45 LPA and INR 12 LPA, respectively. In addition, more than 370 offers were made and 70 companies visited the campus during IPU Engineering placements 2022. The top recruiters of GGSIPU in 2022 included leading companies such as Adobe, Amazon and Rapido. During Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University BTech placements 2021, a total number of 260 students participated in the placement drive out of which over 127 candidates were placed. For more details regarding GGSIPU placements, Click Here. 

Upvote

Q: Is CAT compulsory for MBA at IPU?

A: 

No, CAT is not the only exam based on which admission is granted. GGSIPU accepts the CAT percentile for MBA admission basis on which a merit list of selected candidates is released for the counselling round. Moreover, for the MBA in IT course, the university conducted IPU CET exam is accepted. In case the seats are left vacant after CAT candidates, then the seat allotment is carried out based on the candidate's CMAT scores.

Upvote

Q: How can I get admission to BBA at IPU?

A: 

For IPU BBA course admission, candidates need to appear for the IPU CET entrance exam conducted by Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University. Based on IPU CET ranks, students must have to follow a seat allotment process via IPU CET Counselling. GGSIPU now also accept CUET-UG scores for admission to this UG course. Interested candidates need to apply offline by paying the requisite fee of INR 2,500. 

Upvote

GGSIPU Admission Process and Important Dates 2025

Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University course admissions is based on the entrance exam. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University application form can be filled out by visiting the official website. Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University accepted entrance exam is IPU CET. IPU admission to most of the courses is based on IPU CET scores, however, the university accepts some national-level exam scores as well.

Candidates willing to get IP University Delhi admission through IPU CET must first apply on centralised admission portal of IPU CET. Download the admit card and then appear for the entrance exam. Afterward, take part in the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University GGSIPU Delhi couselling round. Then visit the official website of the selected college and apply for admission. Candidates can refer to the information below to learn about the Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University admissions dates for 2024:

GGSIPU Application Process 2025

Candidates willing to get Indraprastha University Delhi admission must take part in the IP University admission process before the last date of application. Candidates must know their GGSIPU eligibility criteria and apply accordingly. Follow the GGSIPU application process mentioned below:

Step 1: Visit the official website of GGSIPU which is http://www.ipu.ac.in/.

Step 2: Select the required course.

Step 3: Fill out the application form.

Step 4: Pay the application fee and submit the application form.

GGSIPU Admit Card

Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University (GGSIPU) releases the admit card for its entrance exam IPU CET and for its semester exams. The steps to be followed for downloading IPU CET/ internal/ practical exam admit card are mentioned below:

Step 1: Visit the IPU official website (ipu.ac.in).

Step 2: Enter the application number and date of birth to login.

Step 3: After logging in, the admit card shall be displayed on the screen.

Step 4: Carefully check the details on the hall ticket.

Step 5: Click on the download icon and take a printout of the admit card.

For more details click here

GGSIPU Semester Results 2025

Guru Govind Singh Indraprastha University released IPU results for various UG, PG and doctorate courses online at the official website, ggsipu.ac.in. All the university exam results are available in the PDF format. Students can check the results to know the total marks secured in the exams. A candidate shall be considered passed in the exams, if he/she has secured a minimum of 50% aggregate. IP University issues the mark sheet to all the students post the announcement of results. Below mentioned are the steps to check the IPU result:

Step 1: Visit the official website of Guru Gobind Singh University Delhi at www.ipu.ac.in.

Step 2: Under the Result tab, select the respective exam from the menu and click on Exam Result

Step 3: Select the GGSIPU Delhi course and click on it.

Step 4: Save the PDF appearing on the screen

GGSIPU Affiliated Colleges

In total, Guru Gobind Singh Indraprastha University has various affiliated institutes. There are various IP University Colleges in Delhi, of which 83 are self-financed and 35 are owned and managed by the Government of NCT of Delhi. In these affiliated institutions, 80 academic programmes are being conducted, with an intake of more than 22,000 students. This list includes Women's Colleges, Co-ed as well as Vocational colleges. The core specialisations of these institutes include Law, Engineering, Management, Medical, and Dentistry. Apart from this, the universitys east campus comprises two additional university schools. How to reach GGSIPU?

The nearest Metro station to the University campus of GGSIPU is Dwarka Sec-14 metro station. The university is also providing a mini bus service for free of cost from the Metro station to the Campus. By DTC Bus:- A DTC bus from New Delhi Railway Station (NDLS) - Dwarka Sec-16 is available to GGSIPU. (Major bus stands :- NDLS, CP, Dhoula Kuan, Dwarka sec-2, GGSIPU)
